data.title: Bob's Best Clients
data.meta_description: I enjoy that taxes are a puzzle and appreciate that just "getting them done" is sometimes the biggest goal.  My 30 years of experience in tax
data.text:
I enjoy that taxes are a puzzle and appreciate that just "getting them done" is sometimes the biggest goal. My 30 years of experience in tax compliance help me get to that result fast. I am a good fit for you if you are:

A person who wants to keep communication about taxes quick and clean

Like brief meetings and spontaneous phone calls

Appreciate decades of experience and are ready to trust my judgement

Looking for a long-term relationship with as little hassle as possible

Appreciate quick turnaround of projects

My clients tend to stay with me for a decade or more and I now work with some of their children. Most of my clients are local and appreciate being able to just stop into the office for a quick face to face word, but I also have clients I have never met who live in other states. Because of my years of experience I have "seen it all" and I can assist you with even the most complicated situations including:

Trusts and Estates

Multi state issues - both individually and with your business activities

Not for Profit entities

Consolidated business entities and family conglomerates

Required to have a formal Compilation or Review completed (these are attest engagements)

I am not a good fit for you if you are:
